form_title.ms_form_title_llm_v1: AFFIDAVIT RE ASSETS AND LIABILITIES TO BE SUBMITTED BY EVERY REFUGEE 17 YEARS OF AGE OR OVER APPLYING FOR PAROLE INTO THE UNITED STATES, Form G-648 ( (G-2-75)

full_text: Screened by NARA, 9/21/2023 A 21 - 201.153.2140 AFFIDAVIT RE ASSETS AND LIABILITIES TO BE SUBMITTED BY EVERY REFUGEE 17 YEARS OF AGE OR OVER APPLYING FOR PAROLE INTO THE UNITED STATES I, Pham Due Ke being duly sworn depose and say: 1. I have on deposit in banks in the United States and in other countries the following: Location Name of Bank Amount Killeen first National Bank $100.000 2. I have stocks and bonds in the United States and in other countries in the amount of $ market value as follows: Company/Government Unit No. of Shares or Bonds Value 3. I own real estate in the United States and in other countries as follows: Location Value Mortgages and other encumbrances thereon amounting to 4. I have in currency, gold, silver, diamonds, commodities, objects d'art in the United States and in other countries as follows: Location Item Value 5. I have the following assets in real and personal property in the United States and in other countries, not listed above as follows: Location Item Value RECEIVED FEB 24 1976 6. My total net worth is as follows: $ 100 000 DISTR CT DIRECTOR immigration & Naturalization Service SAN ANTONIO, TEXAS (Complete and true Signature of Applicant) Subscribed and sworn to before me by the above-named applicant at Killeen on 2.18.1976 blog (month/day/year) PHAM DH. C KE Name of Interpreter (Print) Signature of Interpreter (Signature and Title of Officer) (Reverse of this form may be used if additional space is needed) Form G-648 (G-2-75) UNITED STATES DEPARTMENT OF JUSTICE Immigration and Naturalization Service
